articles.title: Sri Lanka vs India, 1st ODI: When And Where To Watch Live Streaming, Live Telecast | Cricket News - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Sri Lanka vs India: Shikhar Dhawan-led Team India will look to test out different combinations as they take on Sri Lanka in the ODI series opener in Colombo on Sunday.
articles.content: India, without their regular skipper Virat Kohli, are all set to take on Sri Lanka in a three-match One-Day International series (ODIs) starting on Sunday, July 18. The ODI series was scheduled to be… [+1521 chars]
